para.text: lists the recommended lubricants and hydraulic oils.

table.style: border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:6px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:6px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.text: Obtain an SDS (Safety Data Sheet) from the supplier of the lubricant or hydraulic oil, and handle the lubricant or hydraulic oil according to the contents of the material safety data sheet.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
para.text: The SDS contains information about health and safety, and emergency responses.

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.text: When handling oils, cutting fluids, and other chemical substances, wear protective gloves and safety goggles according to the instructions in the SDS.

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.text: Lubricants and hydraulic oils affect the precision and performance of the machine. Therefore, be sure to use the oils recommended by Makino.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
para.text: If using lubricant or hydraulic oil other than those recommended by Makino, contact Makino service representatives.

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:6px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:6px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.link: Table 2.3 Recommended Lubricants and Hydraulic Oils
li.text: ". If using lubricating oil or hydraulic oil other than those recommended by Makino, the original lubricant oil must be drained completely from the tank before refilling.
